Title: Gita for Teens
Subtitle: This one-of-a-kind book is carefully crafted to introduce teens to the timeless wisdom of the Bhagavad Gita.
Subtitle 2:
• Engaging & Thought-Provoking: Designed for teenagers, this book explores life’s biggest mysteries—Karma, God, Creation, and more—through an analytical, step-by-step approach.

  • Wisdom in Action- Features real-life situations where Gita’s teachings help teens make better decisions, understand good vs. bad actions, and find inner peace (Ananda).

  • Simple & Accessible Learning- Key shlokas with easy explanations, making Gita’s wisdom fun, relatable, and practical for today’s teens.
Meta Description:
Teenagers love solving puzzles, helping friends through challenges, and diving into mystery books. Now, myNachiketa invites them to unlock the mysteries of life with Gita for Teens.
This one-of-a-kind book is carefully crafted to introduce teens to the timeless wisdom of the Bhagavad Gita. Inside, they’ll find powerful shlokas, debates on the nature of God, and thoughtful exploration of life's biggest questions and mysteries.

Some of the key questions targeted in this book are:

Who am I?
Why am I here?
What is the purpose of life?

If you’re searching for answers to these questions, Gita for Teens may provide them—or, at the very least, guide you on the path to discovering them.

Title: Shloka and Doha
Subtitle: Shloka and Doha|Activity Book for age 9+ |12 meaningful shlokas from Gita, Ramayana and Upanishads
Subtitle 2: Shloka & Doha Activity Book presents meaningful shlokas, mantras & dohas for children from some of the most popular Hindu texts with interesting activities. Ideal for parents to teach their children. It gives a deep insight into the questions such as: Why are there so many Gods? Does God have a form and so on.
Meta Title: Shloka and Doha Activity book | Mantras and Prayers
Meta Description: 12 shlokas, mantras and dohas from Gita, Ramayana, Puranas and Upanishads; reflections and activities such as drawing, coloring, puzzles, crossword and story completion. Ideal for gifting.

Title: Discovering God
Subtitle: Discovering God | Hindu Philosophy for Children | Knowledge of Gita and Upanishads | Shlokas and Mantras.
Subtitle 2: Discovering God is a first-of-its-kind book, which explores questions about God and ourselves. The book brings the philosophy of Gita and Upanishads to children in a fun & interactive way. Rather than just giving simple answers, it makes the child think, reflect, do activities and reach their own answers.
Meta Title: Discovering God: Interactive Book simplifying the concept of God
Meta Description: Empower young minds with wisdom of the Bhagavad Gita explaining concepts of karma, atma, consciousness and others. Colorful pictures, mantras, quotes, activities and exercises for joyful learning in kids.

Title: Gita for Beginners
Subtitle: Discover the Wisdom of the Gita in a Simple and Accessible Way!
Subtitle 2:
• ​Effortless Learning - Includes 5–10 key shlokas per chapter with simple translations while preserving the original essence.

  • Beginner-Friendly Approach - Overcome the fear or hesitation of reading the Gita with easy word meanings and dual-language (Sanskrit & English) shlokas.

  • First in Its Category - Complete the book in just 10 days, making Gita's wisdom accessible and practical for everyone! (children to adults)

Title: Gita Adventures
Subtitle: Who doesn’t love adventures, solving mysteries, and having fun with friends? Whether you're a kid or an adult, the thrill of a good story never fades!
Subtitle 2: myNachiketa brings to you a delightful collection of 8 Gita-inspired stories for children. These stories not only provide the joy of exciting adventures but also present the profound and insightful teachings of the Gita, Upanishads, and Ramayana in a captivating and engaging way.
Meta Title: Gita Adeventures with Nachiketa and Nachiketi
Meta Description: myNachiketa brings to you a delightful collection of 8 Gita-inspired stories for children. These stories not only provide the joy of exciting adventures but also present the profound and insightful teachings of the Gita, Upanishads, and Ramayana in a captivating and engaging way.

Title: Gita For Kids
Subtitle: Gita for Kids | Teachings, Sanskrit lessons and Activities | For all ages of children (6+ years)
Subtitle 2: Gita for kids is a unique book that brings teachings of Gita to kids in a simple, fun and engaging way. It contains Krishna’s teachings together with stories, examples and activities. As you tell your kids stories of Ramayana and Mahabharat, do introduce Gita’s teachings to them as well.
Meta Description: Gita for kids is a unique book that brings teachings of Gita to kids in a simple, fun and engaging way. It contains Krishna’s teachings together with stories, examples and activities. As you tell your kids stories of Ramayana and Mahabharat, do introduce Gita’s teachings to them as well.

Title: Nachiketa Tells Stories
Subtitle: Nachiketa Tells Stories | 8 adventure stories with echoes of Gita and Upanishads | Fun Illustrations to color
Subtitle 2: Nachiketa tells Stories creates a magical world of 8 adventurous, fun-filled stories, which will keep your child hooked and boost their imagination. The characters in our stories are either little boys and girls or animals who carry the heart and spirit of a child.
Meta Title: Nachiketa Tells Stories: Adventure stories inspired by Gita and Upanishads
Meta Description: 8 adventurous moral stories which provide Vedic ideas for children. Includes fun illustrations to color and interesting activities. Stories to read at bedtime!

Title: Gita Rhyme Book
Subtitle: Gita Rhyme Books Collection
Subtitle 2: Collection of 3 Rhyme "Where is God?", "How many Gods?", and "How to search for God?”. The key characteristics of the book include : - Gita concepts through simple poems - Easy to learn and recite in school - Water-color pictures - Fun activity included - Buy and sing to your child now!
Meta Title: Gita Rhyme Book in English and Hindi: Read, Learn and Recite
Meta Description: Baby songs teaching philosophical ideas and pondering over questions like "How many Gods?", "How to search for God?" and "Where is God?".  Empower children with valuable life lessons and moral values through easy-to-understand poems.

Title: Gita Colouring and Sticker Book
Subtitle: Gita Colouring & Sticker Book | Stickers to Boost The Morale of Kids | Ideal for Teachers and Parents | Colouring Book for kids aged 3 and above
Subtitle 2: The Gita Colouring & Sticker Book merges Gita teachings into each picture, showcasing Krishna's lessons in Hindi and English. Perfect for parents and teachers to instill morals, it includes stickers of Krishna, Hanuman, and more, drawing inspiration from Hindu scriptures. Inspiring early learners, it aids skill development by boosting concentration, creativity, and imagination.
Meta Description: My first Gita Colouring & Sticker Book | Stickers to Boost The Morale of Kids | Ideal for Teachers and Parents | Colouring Book for kids aged 3 and above

Title: Gita Prerit Kahaniya
Subtitle: गीता प्रेरित कहानियाँ | पढ़ो • सोचो • समझो | रंग भरने के लिए सुंदर चित्रों के साथ
Subtitle 2: गीता प्रेरित कहानियाँ - myNachiketa ने 8 मजेदार कहानियों का एक संग्रह बनाया है, जो आपके बच्चों की कल्पनाशक्ति को बढ़ावा देगा। हमारी कहानियों के पात्र या तो छोटे लड़के और लड़कियाँ हैं या जानवर हैं जिनमें एक बच्चे का दिल और भावना है।
Meta Title: Gita Prerit Kahaniya: Hindi Story book of Gita and Upanishad teachings simplified for children
Meta Description: Discover 8 thrilling stories infused with Vedic wisdom for kids in hindi. Enjoy this interactive hindi book containing delightful illustrations for coloring and engaging activities. Perfect bedtime tales!

Title: Gita Rhyme Book
Subtitle: Gita Rhyme Book
Subtitle 2: 3 rhymes का संग्रह “कहाँ हैं भगवान?, कितने हैं भगवान?, कैसे ढूँढें भगवान को? इस किताब की प्रमुख विशेषताएँ : -सरल किताबों के माध्यम से गीता का ज्ञान -आसानी से याद करें और स्कूल में सुनाएँ -Water-color चित्र -अभी अपने बच्चे के लिए खरीदें और उनके लिए गाएँ!
Meta Title: Gita Rhyme Book in English and Hindi: Read, Learn and Recite
Meta Description: Baby songs teaching philosophical ideas and pondering over questions like "How many Gods?", "How to search for God?" and "Where is God?".  Empower children with valuable life lessons and moral values through easy-to-understand poems.

Title: Bhagwan ki Khoj
Subtitle: भगवान की खोज | बच्चों के लिए गीता और उपनिषदों का ज्ञान | श्लोक और मंत्र
Subtitle 2: भगवान की खोज अपनी तरह की पहली पुस्तक है, जो भगवान और खुद के बारे में सवालों की खोज करती है। यह पुस्तक बच्चों के लिए गीता और उपनिषदों के दर्शन को एक मजेदार और इंटरएक्टिव तरीके से  dikhati है। सरल उत्तर देने के बजाय, यह बच्चे को सोचने, विचार करने, activities करने और अपने उत्तर खोजने में मदद करती है।
Meta Title: भगवान की खोज | बच्चों के लिए गीता और उपनिषदों का ज्ञान | श्लोक और मंत्र

Title: Bhagavad Gita Bachcho Ke Liye
Subtitle: भगवद् गीता बच्चों लिए | सीख, संस्कृत पाठ और क्रियाएँ | हर आयु के बच्चों के लिए (6+ वर्ष )
Subtitle 2: ‘भगवद् गीता बच्चों के लिए’ एक अनोखी किताब है जो गीता का ज्ञान बच्चों तक सरल, रोचक और मज़ेदार तरीके से पहुँचाती है। इसमें कृष्ण की सीख कहानियों, उदाहरणों और क्रियाओं के माध्यम से समझाए गए हैं। जिस तरह आप अपने बच्चों को रामायण और महाभारत कहानियाँ हैं वैसे ही उन्हें गीता के ज्ञान से भी परिचित कराएँ।
Meta Description: Gita for kids is a unique book that brings teachings of Gita to kids in a simple, fun and engaging way. It contains Krishna’s teachings together with stories, examples and activities. As you tell your kids stories of Ramayana and Mahabharat, do introduce Gita’s teachings to them as well.

Title: Jadui Gita yatra
Subtitle: कौन रोमांचक यात्राएँ, रहस्यों को सुलझाना और दोस्तों के साथ मस्ती करना पसंद नहीं करता? चाहे बच्चे हों या बड़े, एक अच्छी कहानी का मज़ा कभी पुराना नहीं होता!
Subtitle 2: myNachiketa आपके लिए लेकर आया है बच्चों के लिए 8 गीता-प्रेरित कहानियों का एक अनोखा संग्रह। इन कहानियों में न केवल मज़ेदार रोमांच और आनंद है, बल्कि गीता, उपनिषद और रामायण की गहरी और प्रेरणादायक शिक्षाएँ भी हैं, जो बहुत ही सरल और दिलचस्प तरीके से प्रस्तुत की गई हैं

Title: Gita Colouring and Sticker Book
Subtitle: Gita Colouring & Sticker Book | बच्चों को प्रेरित करने के लिए Stickers | शिक्षकों और माता-पिता की पहली पसंद | 3 से अधिक आयु के बच्चों के लिए coloring book
Subtitle 2: Gita Colouring & Sticker Book में चित्रों के माध्यम से गीता के उपदेश प्रस्तुत किए गए हैं। इस किताब के हर चित्र के साथ कृष्ण की सीख हिंदी और अंग्रेजी में दी गई है। माता-पिता और शिक्षकों के लिए एक उत्तम माध्यम अच्छे मुल्य पहुँचाने का। इस किताब में कृष्ण, हनुमान और अन्य के स्टिकर्स शामिल हैं, हिन्दू शास्त्रों से प्रेरित चित्र। यह किताब एकाग्रता, रचनात्मकता, और कल्पना को बढ़ाकर पूर्ण विकास में मदद करती है।
Meta Description: My first Gita Colouring & Sticker Book | Stickers to Boost The Morale of Kids | Ideal for Teachers and Parents | Colouring Book for kids aged 3 and above
